description: This Dart file implements a Flutter widget named BirthdayFormPage, which provides a user interface for creating a new Birthday object. The form includes fields for entering a name and selecting a date, and upon submission, it adds the new birthday to a provider and navigates back.

classes.name: BirthdayFormPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a form for inputting birthday details.

classes.name: _BirthdayFormPageState
classes.description: State class managing the form state, including text controllers, date picker, validation, and submission.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker dialog for user to select a birthday date, and updates the state.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates the form, creates a Birthday object, adds it to the provider, and closes the form.
